xwikidoc.content: help.tipsPanel.title=Savjeti help.tipsPanel.noTipMessage=Nema dostupnih savjeta\! help.tipsPanel.gettingStartedTip=Ako započinjete s XWikijem, pregledajte [[Vodič za započinjanje>>http\://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GettingStarted/]]. help.tipsPanel.jumpToPageTip=Idite na bilo koju stranicu u wikiju s Ctrl+G ili Meta+G.\nPogledajte [[još kratica>>http\://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/KeyboardShortcuts]]. help.tipsPanel.improveXWikiTip=Jeste li znali da možete poboljšati XWiki? Odvojite 5 minuta kako biste [[ispunili ovu anketu>>http\://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Survey/ProductFeedback]] i pomogli ovom projektu otvorenog koda\! help.tipsPanel.breadcrumbsTip=Možete kliknuti na strelice pored elemenata mrvica kako biste brzo navigirali do stranica srodnika i djece. ### Missing: help.tipsPanel.advancedHiddenShortcutTip=Press the x+x+x+a key combo to toggle the [[Advanced mode>>http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HSimpleandAdvancededitingmodes]] and x+x+x+h to toggle the display of [[hidden pages>>http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HHidingPages]]. ### Missing: help.tipsPanel.linkAutocompleteWYSIWYGTip=When editing in WYSIWYG, type ##[## and then start typing letters to get suggestions for creating a link. help.macroList.title=Dostupni makroi help.macroList.id=Identifikator help.macroList.name=Ime help.macroList.category=Kategorija help.macroList.description=Opis help.macroList.visibility=Vidljivost
